urls.title: Flair Airlines - Best prices on flights in Canada
urls.description: Flair Airlines is here to change the way Canadians travel. Learn more about Flair Airlines, our low fares across Canada, and book your flights!

data.text: @MagplaneTechno1 Service to YXX starts Aug. 1 with 5 destinations. Low fares are open for booking now at https://t.co/Ehj3JcVjh5.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text:
To help you remain flexible as local measures continue to change across Canada, Flair provides COVID Coverage on all flights so you can easily rebook your travel should new restrictions affect your plans. Please see link for the terms and conditions. ✈️ 

https://t.co/0u6uGiV5Rw https://t.co/ILuuIP0jii
